title: Usability Evaluation and Design Strategies for e-Learning in Multicultural Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital learning tool proficiency, elementary education field experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing e-learning design competencies reflecting cultural differences for elementary education practitioners in multinational corporations

learning_goals: Explain three or more principles of e-learning interface design considering cultural contexts.
Conduct a multicultural learner needs analysis process using usability evaluation tools.
Improve PBL-developed e-learning content at least twice through peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
